title: unnaiyanrO
sahitya:
unnaiyanrO enrum urutuNai enrE nAn eNNi varuginrEn SaNmukha aNNalE


anupallavi

  cenni malai mEvum sEvark-koDiyOnE vanna mayilErum vaLLi maNavALanE


caraNam    tan nigharillAmal tayakkamE illAmal tannaDiyAr paDum innalait-tuDaippAnE
enna pizhai purindEn enrerivillai nAn unnaruLaip-perAmal innum irukkirEn
